title: 【3.11.0.3版本重要更新】MOD再次启用|然而作者带来了有关32位64位的官方解释
author: Sakura小樱花
txt_content:
然而这里是一只樱花带来的翻译更新
作者要发奋图强了，游戏要超神了




3.11.0.3更新内容~
公告-Nelson Sexton

哈喽【标准开头XD】

如果你对正在测试的Unturned感兴趣，你可以打开你的Steam游戏库右键点击Unturned，选择属性，找到“测试”栏，输入代码“OPERATIONMAPLELEAF”体验测试版的Unturned哟~

更新内容：

添加：
服务器浏览页面添加历史和收藏选项暂停菜单新增我喜爱的服务器选项在服务器过滤项中添加创意工坊内容过滤器

改进：
改进Steam云与游戏的分离系统

调整：
重新启用创意工坊内容（MOD可以继续使用了）

修复：
修复太阳/月亮会在下雪时消失修复天空与水面交界处的过渡图形修复暴雪中的天空修复成就解锁问题修复运行时更改密码的问题修复ENUM解析



作者的话：  添加64位系统版本后似乎造成了一些混乱，这不表示UN只能在64位系统上玩，而是说，如果你是64位系统，将自动下载与你匹配的64位版本UN。


 （意思就是说，你32位系统在Steam上自动下载32位版本UN，64位系统Steam会给你自动提供64位版本UN，不代表“删除了32位“)

  本周三和周四我最后两门期末考试就搞定了
  之后的暑假游戏将会有巨大的更新！：D


Hello!
 If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode "OPERATIONMAPLELEAF".
 Additions: 
 Added history and favorites list to server browser.
 Added ability to favorite servers in the pause menu.
 Added workshop filter to server browser.
 Improvements:
 Improved separation between steam cloud and game.
 Tweaks:
 Tweaked workshop content to be enabled again.
 Fixes:
 Fixed sun/moon to fade out in snow.
 Fixed skybox transition in water.
 Fixed skybox transition in blizzard.
 Fixed saving stat/achievement unlocks.
 Fixed changing password while running.
 Fixed enum parsing.
 There seems to be some confusion over the addition of 64-bit support. This does not mean that 32-bit computers cannot play, but rather that players who have a 64-bit operating system will install the 64-bit version of the game. 
 This Wednesday and Thursday I have my last two final exams.  After that it's summer break and tons of progress! :D 
 Thanks for reading!
